summary: Kijiko's custom hairs for Sims3 converted into Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION

seems Nexus server has struck by heavy error storm on hair tag download.
when you face with an error occurred, please use Google Drive mirrors.




===============================================================


Read Me - Kijiko Hair Male Pack


===============================================================


< Originally Made for Sims 3 by. Kijiko >


Blog :: http://kijiko.catfood.jp/

Tumblr :: http://kijiko-sims.tumblr.com/


< Converted into Skyrim by. Goldiocks >


---------------------------------------------------------------------

NOW STEAM AVAILABLE! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=277964654


This hair pack's meshes and textures are made by Kijiko
Goldiocks got permission from Kijiko to convert these artworks
Uploader â‰  Creator

Available for all races except for Khajiit and Argonian.
adds 16 cool hairs. NMM available! just put it to Mods folder and activate it.
enjoy your Skyrim with Kijiko's wonderful hairs, and visit her sites for cool Sims3 CC!
all hairs in this mod and more are available for Sims 3

----------------------------------------------------------------------


Recommended mod to use with - ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer by kapaer :: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?

this mod prevents from CTD by heavy loading of massive hairs at showracemenu screen.
if you have weak PC or the game CTD right after typing showracemenu, it's highly recommended to install.


===================================================

Change log

===================================================

2.0

added female version to basic version(now don't need to have unisex patch for female)
fixed wrong BS Dismember Skin Instance properties and clippings

1.02
Dark hair glitch reported when using with RaceMenu.
if you have this trouble, please try with No Normal map version main file.


1.01
Unisex patch added!
Install main file first and overwrite with optional file.
author: Kijiko and Goldiocks
